description:

The place is 4 Blocks from Q line @ Church Ave. 35 minutes to midtown Manhattan. You’ll love my place,  is a beautiful medium size Studio in Brooklyn, in a rapidly gentrifying area, ice skating ring, food and fun in Prospect Park only few blocks away. Restaurants are sprawling on Flatbush and streets around.

Clean and calm building, 2nd floor on streets side, gets lots of lightGood for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Charming cozy Studio,
review: Really enjoyed my stay! The apartment is great and Corrado is super accommodating.
